content:
That's awesome! It sounds like you had a great experience at the new coffee shop!

A friendly barista can make all the difference, and it's even better when you find a shared interest to chat about. 80s music is a great conversation starter, and I'm sure you both geeked out over your favorite bands and songs.

Cold brew on tap is a great way to enjoy coffee, especially during warm weather. The smooth, low-acidity flavor profile is perfect for hot summer days. Did you find out if the coffee shop sources their beans from a local roaster or has a unique brewing process?

It's great that you're exploring new coffee shops and finding ones that resonate with you. Who knows, you might have just discovered a new favorite hangout spot!

By the way, what's your go-to 80s jam? Are you more of a fan of synth-heavy new wave, big hair rock, or perhaps hip-hop's golden era?
